content.rendered:
Home Security Systems For Safety Measures in Ontario

Home Security Systems in Ontario is a safety tool with alert alarms and sensors that keeps an eye on all the entering and exiting points of your home and in all the places you demand.

Why Are Home Security Systems in Ontario Important?

The function of a home security system is to protect you, your family, and your property by detecting intruders who don’t belong inside. When you have a good-quality alarm system with sensors set up on windows, doors, and other entry points, you have peace of mind knowing that your home is protected against burglars looking to get in while everyone is asleep or away from home. These are all automated and alert.

REQUEST A CONSULTATION

Home Surveillance Services By Hexa Control

Our home surveillance systems use monitors,door sensors and glass break detectors, which let you check out what’s going on in and around your home. They can help protect against fires, flooding, break-ins and carbon monoxide leaks. Some even give you voice control so you can tell Alexa through your smartphone to show you what’s happening at home.

Surveillance

Keep eyes on all areas of your house with real-time recording and backed up footage.

Door Locks

Never worry about locking yourself out; plus control your door locks from anywhere.

Alarm Systems

Monitor all points of entry to your home with high-tech sensors and 24/7 surveillance.

Video Doorbell

See who is at the door and talk to them through your smartphone from wherever you are.

Lighting

Protect your home while you’re away with automated lighting and motorized blinds.

Security Camera Installation Services By Hexa Control

By investing in good Camera installation services, you can avoid common headaches and save money. Getting a security camera installed by Hexa Control ensures you take advantage of benefits like motion detection and two-way audio for true peace of mind. Not only will you see what’s happening when it happens, but you’ll also hear what’s happening around your home before it becomes an issue. You don’t need to be responsible for electrical work or ensuring all of your smart home devices play nicely together—leave that up to the professionals of Hexa Control. They have experience setting up everything from alarm systems to surveillance systems. These camera installation services are exceptional in performance. Your security is our top priority, and we make it possible with our genius and responsible systems. These are inexpensive, durable, reliable, and efficient camera systems. These systems will free you from the troubles of taking care of doors and gates. Contact us for more details!

Read more

It Pays to Work With Hexa Control Home Surveillance

Quality Products

We carry products from Canada’s leading brands of home automation systems. We work with trusted industry leaders and experts in integrating all systems to work together seamlessly.

Honesty

We are honest in the delivery of our services. We always ensure you receive the care and attention you need as we work with you to build a smart home solution that fits your lifestyle.

Responsive

We are responsive to our customers. If you have a question about a smart home system, give us a call, and we’ll be happy to chat. We also make it easy to set up an appointment

Satisfaction Guarantee

We offer a 100% satisfaction guarantee! It’s important to us that our clients feel secure in their purchase; if there is ever a problem with a product or an install, let us know right away.

Warranty

In addition to the manufacturer's warranty, we also warranty our work to ensure that you are never left high and dry. Our warranty covers all defects and faults made during installation.

No Hidden Costs

We are honest, upfront, and transparent about the work we provide. There are never hidden costs or added fees; we’ll work out a budget with you, and we’ll stick within it no matter what.

REQUEST A CONSULTATION
